title: honda returns to FURIA's starting lineup as junior is benched
description: The North American AWPer will return home as he looks to reset after a loss of individual form.

title: Vitality beat Gambit to secure playoffs berth, Complexity eliminate Sprout at IEM Summer
description: The Frenchmen took the world's No. 1 team by surprise with a convincing victory.

title: OG, Virtus.pro victorious in final set of IEM Summer opening matches
description: OG’s attack was too much for NIP to handle on Mirage.

title: Evil Geniuses, Heroic win IEM Summer Group B opening matches
description: Evil Geniuses broke a five match losing streak with their victory against Spirit.

title: FPX upset Astralis on Ancient; G2 dominate Extra Salt in IEM Summer
description: The first map of Ancient played between top 20 teams went the way of FunPlus Phoenix.

title: SHOOWTiME on fer: "He has a completely different vision of the game"
description: The 24-year-old praised his new teammate's impact and gave his take on Imperial's chances heading into IEM Summer.

title: Vitality, Gambit secure opening wins in IEM Summer
description: The $250,000 tournament kicked off with BO1 matches in group A.

title: CIS teams call on Valve to launch Akuma investigation
description: The participating teams in EPIC League CIS have also asked the game developer to enforce strict protocols in future tournaments.

title: OG defeat BIG to win Spring Sweet Spring 2
description: Valdemar "valde" Bjørn Vangså and Mateusz "mantuu" Wilczewski were the driving force for the international team's first title victory as a five.

title: MANS NOT HOT return with new Swedish-Lithuanian roster
description: Rokas "EspiranTo" Milasauskas and Simon "twist" Eliasson will be two of the players under the orders of coach Neil "NeiL_M" Murphy.
